articles.description: Ewan, who plays the titular character in the show, looked in high spirits as he was joined by co-star Hayden (Darth Vader) and a group of Stormtroopers on the roof of the swanky Corinthia hotel.
articles.content:
They will soon return to their iconic roles 17 years after their appearance in Star Wars: Revenge Of The Sith.
And co-stars Ewan McGregor, 51, and Hayden Christensen, 41, hit London on Thursday ahea… [+5102 chars]

articles.author: Liz Scarlett
articles.title: James Hetfield makes congratulatory call to woman who gave birth at Metallica gig - Louder
articles.description: After learning that a Metallica fan gave birth to a baby boy at his band's show in Brazil last Saturday, James Hetfield has called the new mother to congratulate her
articles.content:
Earlier this week, a woman made headlines after giving birth to a baby boy at Metallica's show in Curitiba, Brazil on May 7.
